section1.label: What is a cybersecurity company?
section1.title: Understanding the crucial role of cybersecurity companies
section1.description: A cybersecurity company, like Cyber-SSI, plays an essential role in protecting data and IT systems against digital threats. In a world where cyberattacks are increasingly sophisticated, these companies provide advanced security solutions to protect sensitive information for SMBs, startups, public administrations and institutions. Their importance lies in their ability to prevent data breaches, secure digital infrastructures and ensure business continuity.

section2.label: Why use a cybersecurity company?
section2.title: The benefits of working with cybersecurity experts
section2.description: Using a cybersecurity company is crucial for any organization looking to protect its digital assets. Cyber-SSI offers unmatched expertise in identifying vulnerabilities, implementing custom security solutions and ensuring compliance with international standards like ISO 27001. By working with us, businesses can reduce cyberattack risks, avoid financial losses and preserve their reputation.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Cyber-SSI is committed to protecting the privacy of users of its website and services. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, store and protect your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR - EU Regulation 2016/679).

dataCollected.title: 3. Personal Data Collected
dataCollected.intro: We may collect the following categories of data:
dataCollected.identificationDesc: name, surname, email address, phone number
dataCollected.connectionDesc: IP address, browser type, pages visited, date and time of connection
dataCollected.communicationDesc: content of messages sent via our contact form

purposes.title: 4. Processing Purposes
purposes.intro: Your personal data is processed for the following purposes:
items: Respond to your contact and information requests
Comply with our legal and regulatory obligations

legalBasis.title: 5. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.intro: The processing of your data is based on the following legal bases:
legalBasis.contractDesc: for the provision of our services
legalBasis.interestDesc: to improve our services and ensure the security of our website

recipients.title: 6. Data Recipients
recipients.intro: Your personal data may be transmitted to the following categories of recipients:
items: Our authorized personnel within the scope of their duties
Competent authorities in case of legal obligation
recipients.noSale: We never sell your personal data to third parties.

transfers.title: 7. Transfers Outside the EU
transfers.content: Your data is primarily processed within the European Union. In case of transfer to a third country, we ensure that appropriate safeguards are in place (European Commission standard contractual clauses, adequacy decision, etc.).

retention.title: 8. Retention Period
retention.intro: Your data is retained for the following periods:
retention.clientDuration: duration of contractual relationship + 5 years (legal obligations)

rights.title: 9. Your Rights
rights.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:

access.title: Right of access
access.desc: Obtain confirmation that your data is being processed and receive a copy

rectification.title: Right to rectification
rectification.desc: Have your inaccurate or incomplete data corrected

erasure.title: Right to erasure
erasure.desc: Request deletion of your data in certain cases

restriction.title: Right to restriction
restriction.desc: Limit the processing of your data in certain situations

portability.title: Right to portability
portability.desc: Receive your data in a structured and readable format

objection.title: Right to object
objection.desc: Object to processing for legitimate reasons

rights.howToDesc: Send your request by email to contact@cyber-ssi.com specifying your identity and the right you wish to exercise. We will respond within one month.

complaint.title: 10. Right to Complain
complaint.content: If you believe that the processing of your personal data constitutes a violation of GDPR, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the CNIL (Commission Nationale de l'Informatique et des Libertés):

cookies.title: 11. Cookies
cookies.intro: Our website uses cookies to improve your browsing experience. Cookies are small text files stored on your device.
cookies.essentialDesc: necessary for the website to function
cookies.analyticsDesc: to understand how the website is used (with your consent)
cookies.manage: You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.

security.title: 12. Data Security
security.intro: As cybersecurity experts, we implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction:

modifications.title: 13. Policy Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Any modification will be published on this page with an updated date. We encourage you to regularly check this page.

contact.title: 14. Contact Us
contact.content: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or the exercise of your rights, contact our DPO:
